Frag Grenade will be destroyed by Jager ADS if they come in contact with it. 

Frag Grenade can be used to kill a Defender. 

Frag Grenade can be cooked before throwing at target. This is useful for killing Defender without giving them time to escape from the grenade. 

Frag Grenade will take 5 seconds before detonation. 

Frag Grenade explosion can be used to kill Defenders from below the floor. You need good map knowledge. After finding the position of the Defender, Cook and throw the grenade at that position from below the floor targeting the ceiling. If it is a wooden floor, the Defender will be killed or take high damage from it. 

Frag Grenades can be used to destroy Frost Welcome Mats. 

Frag Grenades can be used to destroy Castle Armor Panels. 

Frag Grenades can be used to destroy Bandit Batteries from below the floor. You need good map knowledge for it. 

Frag Grenade explosion can be used to create holes in walls and floors. The hole made is not very big though.

Smoke Grenade can be used to enter the objective without Defenders seeing you. The smoke from it will cover your body. 

Smoke Grenade can be used to plant the Defuser without giving information about the plant location to the Defenders. 

Smoke Grenade can used to assist Glaz with his Thermal scope. 

Smoke Grenade can be thrown at Mira Black Mirror if any to deny vision through it. 

Smoke Grenade can be thrown at any entrances and rotation holes made by Defenders to prevent them from using it. 

Smoke Grenade can be thrown behind while pushing forward to cover your flank.

Breaching Charge can be used to destroy unreinforced walls and floors. 

Breaching Charge can be used to destroy Castle Armor Panels. 

Breaching Charge will destoy any Defender gadget if they are in close proximity to the explosion from it. 

Breaching Charge can be used to quick open a barricaded window and hot enter it while rappelling. 

Breaching Charge can be used to destroy floors and create new angles to the Defenders below.

Stun Grenade can be used to blind a Defender. The Defender must look into the flash from the grenade to be blinded by it. 

Stun Grenade can blind Attackers as well as Defenders. 

Stun Grenade emits a large flash and a very loud bang. This will blind and deafen the Defenders temporarily. 

Stunned Defenders cannot see or hear for a period of 5 seconds. 

Stun Grenades will be destroyed by Jager ADS if in its line of sight. 

Stun Grenade will blink Ying even with her Goggles. 

Stun Grenade can be used to flash anyone playing behind the Mira Black mirror. 

Stun Grenade can be used to flash the Defenders in the room before Fuze uses his Cluster charges. This was Defenders will not be able to detect where the cluster charges are being placed. 

Stun Grenade need to be thrown for activation. They cannot be cooked like Frag grenades. After throwing, they will activate after a two seconds. 

Facing away from the Stun Grenade will prevent its effects on Defenders. When partially facing the flash from Stun grenade, Defenders will be take the effects partially.

Claymore is very useful to cover your behind. 

Claymore emits two laser light on its front, which when in contact with Defenders will explode instanly. This will kill or down the Defender who comes in contact with it. 

Claymore placement is very important, It must be placed in such a way the Defenders cannot see the laser. 

Claymore can be shot down by the Defenders. It will be destoyed from any explosion. 

Placing Claymore on top of stairs is very effective. When Defenders try to come up the stairs, they will not notice the laser from the Claymore easily. 

Claymore are effective when placed near windows and door. This will prevent the Defender who is running out and will kill them. 

Claymoe emit a noise when Attackers have deployed them. This can be used to warn Defenders about it. 

Claymore laser beam is very small, It can pass through a hole in the wall. This can be used to strategically place a claymore without even giving the Defenders a chance to see it.

Deployable Shield can be used to take cover from bullet fire. It will prevent the bullets from reaching you. 

Deployable Shield can be used to prevent entry into the objective by placing it in the doorways. This way the Attackers will be forced to vault over it if they are about to enter the objective. 

Deployable Shield can be used with Frost Welcome Mats, This way any Attacker trying to vault over it will be trapped in the Mat. 

Deployable Shield can be used to prevent Twitch drone from entering a room. This can be used to save the Mira Black mirror from being opened by it.

Impact Grenade can be used to create rotations holes in objective. 

Impact Grenade can be used to destroy unreinforced walls and floors. Using it on walls will create a perfect hole at the place of impact. 

Impact Grenade can be used to inflict damage to Attackers. Any Attacker with low health will be killed by it. 

Impact Grenade can be used to create holes in floors. This can be used to cover the floor below from above. 

Impact Grenade is very useful when you are roaming. It can be used to create quick rotation holes and escape from Attackers if they are targeting you. 

Impact Grenade can be used to open unreinforced hatches. 

Impact Grenade will destoy most gadgets if they are in the radius of its explosion.

Nitro Cell can be used as explosive to kill the Attackers. Any Attacker who come in contact with its explosion will be killed instantly. 

Nitro Cell can be used to set traps in wooden floors and walls. With some intel from Defenders like Valkyrie Black eyes, Pulse Sensor, Defender Cameras. 

Once the Attackers are nearby the trap, Nitro cell can be detonated to kill them instantly. 

Nitro cell needs to be activated after throwing to detonate it. 

Nitro Cell is very effective in preventing Attackers from entering the doors and windows. Throw the nitro cell at doors and windows. If any Attacker tries to come through it, activate it and kill them. 

Nitro cell can stick to any surface. 

Nitro cell damage will pass through wooden floors and walls. 

Nitro cell can be thrown through small holes if aimed perfect. 

Nitro cell will be destroyed from bullet fire and if exposed to any form of explosion.

Barbed Wire will slow the movement of Attackers if they are moving on it. 

Barbed Wire are best placed in door entranced and windows to prevent Attackers from pushing inside the objective. 

Barbed Wire can be used with Smoke. When Attackers are exposed to Smoke toxic grenades while moving through a Barbed wire, they will take more damage as they cannot move fast. 

Barbed Wire can be used to prevent Attackers from rushing into the objective. 

Barbed Wire will make a unique sound if any Attacker is moving thought it. Barbed Wire can be used with Bandit Shock Wire. If any Attacker is moving on those shocked Barbed wire, they will take shock damage from it. Any drone in contact with the shock from it will be destroyed. 

Defenders will not be slowed down by the Barbed wire.

Hammer can destroy unreinforced walls, unreinforced hatches , destructible floors and barricades. 

The Hammer can create new lines of sight by using it to create holes in walls or floors. 

The Hammer can be used to create new entry and rotation holes for Attackers. 

The Hammer can destroy Barbed wire ,Castle Armors and most Defender gadgets with one hit. 

The usage of Hammer on anything will reduce its durability. 

The Hammer contains 25 charges to break and destroy things. 

Destroying a wall with Hammer takes two charges while all others take one charge. Swinging the hammer without any contact does not count as a charge. 

There is a slight delay when trying to unequip the Hammer, during which Sledge is vulnerable to gunfire and cannot defend himself. 

The Hammer is also capable of killing enemies with one hit. It counts as two charges. 

The Hammer can be used to destroy multiple Barbed Wire next to each other by hitting at them at their junction. 

When being close to the wall while hitting it with the hammer,it will destroy the double layer of the wall completely. When used a bit away from the wall, it only destroys one layer of the wall leaving the second layer intact.

Thatcher has EMP grenades that will destroy or deactivate the Defender gadgets. 

EMP will destroy Smoke Gas Grenades , Mute Signal Disruptor, Kapkan Entry Denial Devices, Jager Active Defense Systems, Bandit Shock Wire, Valkyrie Black Eyes, Lesion Gu Mines, Ela Grizmot Mines, Nitro Cells.. 

EMP will deactivate Vigil ERC-7, Pulse Heartbeat Sensor and Echo Yokai Drone for while if caught in the radius. 

EMP will disable all Defender Weapon sights for 10 seconds if in the affected radius. ACOGs will also be disabled but only when Defenders are not aiming down the sights. 

EMP will not affect any Attacker gadgets. 

EMP will disable the lights in the room it was thrown into for 5 seconds. 

EMP will disable Laser sights of Defenders which reduce their hip fire accuracy. 

EMP will pass through walls and surfaces, You can destroy gadgets on other side of the wall or floor if they are in the radius of the blast. 

EMP grenades cannot be cooked and will activate seconds after being thrown. 

When you hear the buzzing sound of a Mute Jammer, throwing an EMP at your feet will destroy the Mute Jammer in proximity. 

EMP will make a loud noise when activated, Use that to mask the sound of your footsteps. 

After throwing an EMP in a room, Do not try to push aggressively inside because EMP will disable the lights in the room and will make it harder to you to spot the Defenders. Also note that it will also be difficult for the Defenders to spot you in dark.

Ash can fire CREM breaches from long distances to safely destroy gadgets, barricades from behind cover. 

Ash CREM breaches are not jammed by Mute Jammers since they are not remotely activated. 

Ash CREM breaches deals a mere 85 damage to 1 Armor Operator. 

Ash CREM breaches on contact with defender will deal minimum 50 damage irrespective of the Armor of Defender. 

When walls are not completely covered by reinforcements, CREM breach can destroy the surface above reinforcement. 

Ash CREM breach can remove Mira Black Mirror if it is deployed on unreinforced walls. 

Ash CREM breaches can open up floors with high range of explosion radius. 

Ash CREM breaches can be used to destroy very hard to reach places like higher windows or ceilings. 

Ash CREM breaches can be used to destroy Barbed wires and Shields in the way. 

Ash CREM breaches can be used to destroy Castle barricades. 

Ash CREM breaches can be used to destroy Frost traps in windows and doors. 

Ash CREM breaches can be used to destroy unreinforced hatches and walls. 

Ash CREM breache explosion can be used to kill the downed Defenders. 

Ash CREM breaches will destroy Defender gadgets if they are in radius of the explosion.

Thermite Exothermic Charge can destroy reinforced walls and hatches. 

Using Exothermic Charges on unreinforced walls is waste of utility. 

Detonation of an Exothermic Charge takes 3 seconds. 

Explosion radius from Exothermic Charge is large compared to other methods. 

Detonating an Exothermic Charge in the junction of the wall and floor will destroy them both partially. If there is a hatch near the junction, it will be destroyed along with the wall. 

Exothermic Charge will destroy large areas adjacent to it. This can be used to bypass certain Mute Signal Disruptor and destroy hatches and walls even if they are jammed. 

Thermite can counter Bandit trick by using Advanced Gadget Deployment model in game options. Switch areas, Make more noise and confuse Bandit as to where you are placing your Exothermic Charges. Bandit will not be able to guess your position. 

To counter Bandit trick, When placing Exothermic Charge, be sure to get hit from battery shock and place and activate the Exothermic charge as soon as Thatcher EMP goes off.

Twitch has her Shock drones as her primary drone. One Drone is activated during preparation phase. 

Twitch Shock drones can shock enemies and reduce 10 hp. 

Twitch Shock drones can destroy Defender gadgets and their cameras. 

Twitch Shock drones has a limit in how higher their shots can reach. 

Twitch Shock drones have 5 darts in stock. 

Twitch Shock drones can destroy Mira Black Mirrors by shooting at the gas canisters. 

Vigil Video Disruptor will turn off temporarily if shot by a Twitch Shock Drone. 

Twitch Shock drones cannot jump. They can only travel on ground. 

Twitch Shock drones are quieter than other drones. 

Frost Welcome Mat cannot be damaged by Twitch Shock drones. 

Twitch Shock drones are very effective in distracting a Defender by tasing them. This distraction can be used by other Attacker to kill the Defender. 

Twitch Shock Drones can be used to kill downed Defenders.

The Extended Shield protects the entire front body from Defenders. 

The Extended Shield also protects his sides to an extent. 

Nitro Cells will deal Montagne little damage. 

The Montagne Shield will be knocked left when melee attacked by Defender. In such situation he should turn right to adjust with the knocked shield to get cover from it. 

The Extendable Shield can be used to block doorways when fully extended thereby denying passage for Defenders. 

Montagne can use laser with his handgun to perform hip-fire headshots which can be quite deadly if aimed perfect. 

Montagne is well suited to perform a quick recon and provide information to other Attackers. 

Montagne deals less damage from Kapkan traps if his Shield is extended. 

Montagne is very effective in planting Defuser. When Montagne is planting, his Shield protects his back from bullets. Using Smoke grenades to cover the plant will most certainly always lead to success. 

Montagne is very effective in checking rooms for any Defenders who are Roaming. 

Montagne takes less damage from bullets while he is crouch walking.

Glaz uses his OTS03 weapon to support Attackers from long distance. 

Glaz OTS03 weapon can see Defenders through smoke with the help of his Thermal sights. 

Glaz OTS03 weapon can destroy Castle Armor Panel by shooting at them 12 times. 

Glaz can open unreinforced hatches by shooting 3 times with his OTS03 weapon. 

Glaz OTS03 weapon can penetrate two surfaces at once. 

Glaz can use smoke grenades from other Attackers to help him with his thermal sight. 

Glaz OTS03 weapon can penetrate the windows in Plane maps. 

Glaz is very helpful in protecting defuser after plant as he can cover for it from a very long distance with his OTS03 weapon. 

Glaz can provide covers for Attackers from Defender run outs from a long distance using his OTS03 weapon.

Fuze is the most destructive operator. 

Fuze Cluster charges are effective in clearing out rooms without engaging in close range combat. 

Fuze Cluster charges injects small explosive pellets through the surface in which it is being deployed, be it floor or wall. 

The charge pellets are deployed in other side of the wall or floor upon detonation. 
\Cluster Frag Grenades are deployed in count of 5 from right to left. They detonate in the order they are deployed. 

Each pellet have a range of 4m and deal lethal damage. 

Cluster Charge pellets can bounce back surfaces too, Be careful when you place them or they might kill you. 

Fuze Charges can pierce through Castle Armored Panels and create a hole when doing so. This hole can be used for line of sight into the room. 

Fuze Cluster Charges can be used tactically to create confusion and chaos among Defenders. 

Instead of using Fuze Cluster Charges random to get kills, placing them in certain spots based on map knowledge will yield you confirmed kills.

Blitz Shield Flash can blind enemies when flashed. 

Defenders are very vulnerable when in line of sight of the flash as they are blind completely. 

Blitz has total of 4 flashes. 

Blitz can still use the Flash when aiming down the sights. 

Blitz is effective in clearing rooms to find any Defenders who are roaming and can kill them easily. 

Dealing a Blitz alone is very difficult for any Defender. 

Blitz can use laser with his handgun to perform hip-fire headshots which can be quite deadly if aimed perfect. 

Blitz is very effective in planting Defuser. When Blitz is planting, his Shield protects his back from bullets. Using Smoke grenades to cover the plant will most certainly always lead to success. 

Blitz can run with his Shield and flash Defenders at the same time making him very hard to deal with. 

Blitz flash will cause full temporary blindness at range of 4m and works partially till 5m.

IQ can detect Defender gadgets and destroy them through floors and walls. 

IQ can detect bombs and Defender gadgets from a distance. 

IQ is very effective in hunting Pulse as his Gadget will be detected by IQ Spectre. 

IQ is very effective in hunting Vigil as his Gadget will be detected by IQ Spectre. 

IQ can find Kapkan Entry Denial Devices, Nitro cells, Jager Active Defense Systems, Bandit Shock Wires, Smoke Gas grenades, Valkyries Black Eyes, Echo Yokai Drone, Ela Grizmot Mines and more. 

IQ is very effective in preventing Defenders from using Valkyrie Black Eyes for run out kills. 

IQ is very effective in identifying Lesion GU mines which are invisible to naked eye. 

IQ can detect phones when Defenders are using them to check their cameras. 

IQ is very effective in finding Echo Yokai drone and destorying it. She can detect it through walls and can destroy it. 

IQ can detect phones when Defenders are using them to prevent call from Dokkaebi.

Buck uses Skeleton Key to destroy surfaces very fast. 

Buck can destroy surfaces very quickly be it floors, walls or hatches. They must be destructible surfaces. 

Buck can create new lines of sight from above, from below and to adjacent rooms using his Skeleton Key. 

Buck can create holes that can be used for vaulting into. 

The Skeleton Key contains 16 shells in reserve and 1 in chamber. 

Buck is very useful in all map but you must have good map knowledge to use him to his full potential. 

Buck can create chaos by destroying floors and walls and driving Defenders into sense of fear.

Blackbeard uses a Rifle Mounted Shield to protect him from bullet fire. 

The Rifle Shield protect shots to his head. This give him a great advantage to be aggressive when peeking. 

Blackbeard has two rifle shields to deploy. 

Blackbeard can switch between the two anytime if its not broken. 

The Rifle shields withstand upto 60 hp. 

When Rifle Shield is equipped, he moves very slow. 

Blackbeard can recover his normal speed by switching from Rifle Shield Primary to Secondary handgun D50. 

Blackbeard DMR is very deadly if used on a precise level. 

Blackbeard is very effective in holding flanks. 

Blackbeard is very effective in rappelling, He can peek windows and doors with the help of his shield protecting his head from bullet fire. 

Blackbeard is very effective in holding angles from windows or doors of buildings.

Capitao Tactical Crossbow has two different bolts: Asphyxiating Bolts and Micro Smoke Grenades. You can switch either at any time. 

Asphyxiating Bolts can be used to block passage of doors and windows. 

Asphyxiating Bolts can be used to kill downed Defenders. 

Asphyxiating Bolts can be used to prevent Bandit from tricking. Shoot the bolt near the wall where he is tricking, Bandit will be forced to move from there. 

The radius of Asphyxiating Bolts are very small. If any Defender tried to pass it, they will die. 

Asphyxiating Bolts can be used to trap and kill Defenders camped in a corner. 

 Defenders behind the cover of a shield can be killed easily by Asphyxiating Bolts. 

A direct impact of the bolt on Defenders deals 5 damage. 

When arrows are shot to the head of Defenders, It will do normal damage and not instant kill them. It is not considered a Headshot. 

Capitao bolts will not be destroyed by Jager ADS. 

Capitao Micro smoke grenades can be used for cover while trying to plant the Defuser. 

Unlike normal smoke, Capitao Micro smoke grenades release smoke which are blue in color.

X-KAIROS pellets are useful in opening reinforced walls and hatches. 

X-KAIROS will help you open three reinforced hatches at most. 

X-KAIROS need to be detonated after impact manually. 

X-KAIROS can also be used to create entry passages in walls. 

X-KAIROS can be used to open up floor down to create new lines of sight. 

A single pellet from X-KAIROS can destroy open a hatch. 

X-KAIROS will shoot 6 pellets at a time. 

X-KAIROS pellets detonated once will create a hole that helps you crawl into walls. 

X-KAIROS pellets detonated twice will create a hole that helps you crouch walk into walls. 

X-KAIROS pellets detonated thrice will create a hole that helps you walk or sprint into walls. 

X-KAIROS help you open Mira Black Mirrors. 

X-KAIROS takes 5 secs to detonate while Thermite Exothermic Charge only takes 3 secs. 

X-KAIROS can be aimed to precisely fire pellets to a surface. 

X-KAIROS when used at junction of walls and floors, It opens both the wall and floor partially. 

X-KAIROS can be used to destroy Castle barricades.

Jackal is very effective in hunting roamers by tracking their footprints. 

Jackal Eyenox can see footprints of Defenders and scan them to locate their position. The Eyenox pings the location of the Defender 5 times over a period of 20 seconds. 

Defender footprints are colored based on the time it was made, red if 0 sec ago, yellow if 20s ago, green if 45s ago, blue if 65s ago and the tracks disappears at 90s mark. 

Jackal can follow the footsteps of the Defenders to find where they are hiding. 

Footprint tracks will not be made by the Defenders if they are prone while moving. 

All Attackers will see the live ping update of Defender who is being tracked by Jackal. 

Jackal is very effective in detecting any movement of Defenders in the vicinity. 

Jackal shotgun can be used to make rotation holes quickly and outflank the Defender. 

Jackal is very effective to find the position of last Defender alive.

Ying Candela works like Stun grenades.They blind the Defenders and leaves them vulnerable. 

Candelas can be placed on breakable surfaces to fire flashes onto the other side. 

Candelas are very effective in getting the Defuser Planted by blinding Defenders. 

Candelas can be used to waste Jager Active Defense System by placing them on barricades to fire flashes in line of sight of those ADS. 

Candelas can be cooked before release, Doing so delays the detonation and rolls them on the ground for a while. The rolling time depends on how long you wait to release them initially. 

Candelas can be punched through Castle Armor, normal Barricades and Wooden Surfaces. 

Ying wears special goggle that allows her to see through the flashes. 

Ying is very effective in aiding the plant of Defuser. Throwing the Candelas where the Defuser is being planted will blind the Defenders who are trying to push it. 

Ying is very effective in flashing any Defender behind a Black Mirror and prevent them from pre firing. 
\Ying will also blind Attackers if not communicated well.

Zofia can fire Impact Grenades and Proximity Concussion Grenades. She can switch them both any time. 

Zofia has 2 Impact Grenades and 4 Concussion Grenades. 

Zofia impact grenades can be used to create holes in floors and walls. This can be used as new line of sight into the rooms for shooting. 

Concussion Grenades cause Visual and Mobility disorientation effects. 

Concussion Grenades when hit on a surface will rebound and detonate. 

Concussion Grenades will detonate instant when they come in proximity of a Defender. This can be used to detect the position of Defender in a room. 

Zofia is resistant to Ela proximity mine and can recover in half the time taken by other Attackers. 

Zofia has a ability to withstand when in down state. She will recover herself up 5 percent of baseline health. It taked 5 seconds to stand up from downed state. 

There is a arc present to the grenade trajectory of the mines. 

There is no reload process for the grenades. Zofia can fire the grenades one after another. 

Zofia impact grenades can be used to destroy Castle barricades. 

Zofia impact grenades can be used to destroy Shields and Barbed wire in the path. 

Zofia can be used to destroy Mira Black mirror if it is placed in unreinforced walls. 

Zofia impact grenades can be used to destroy surfaces which are hard to reach. 

Zofia impact grenades can be used to kill a downed Defender. 

Zofia impact grenade will destroy Defender gadgets if they are in radius of the explosion.

The Logic Bomb hacks Defender system and calls them. It makes Defenders phones vibrate and give out a buzzing sound helping Attackers locate them easily. 

When Defender phones are called, they will have no longer be able to access Defender cameras unless they switch off the phone. 

Logic Bomb call can only be made twice.Use them wisely. 

Logic Bomb can hack the phone dropped by any Defender who is killed. This hacks the Defender camera network including Valkyrie Black Eyes and makes the camera feed available to the Attackers. 

Logic Bomb calls are very helpful to locate Defenders who are roaming. 

Hacked cameras are accessible to both Attackers and Defenders. 

Explosives will not destroy phones of Defenders, they must be destroyed manually by Defenders. 

Dokkaebi calls can be used to quickly find if any Defender is near by.

Lion EE-One-D drone will detect Defender movement and provide their real time outline for the 4 second duration when its active. 

Lion scan revealing enemy position of Defender can be seen by all the Attackers. 

Lion can call two scans per round. 

Lion EE-One-D will stop detecting Defenders if they stay still. 

Lion can use his Drone with interval of 20 seconds. 

Lion is very effective to detect any Defender movement after Defuser is planted. 

Lion ability is perfect to kill any moving Defender from above or below the floor. 

Lion is a good counter to prevent Defenders from prefiring from Mira Black Mirror. 

Lion is also very useful to detect any Defenders who is trying to spawn peek .

Finka Adrenal shot provide set of abilities which increases the performance of Attackers. 

Finka shot will last for 20 seconds. 

Finka has three Adrenal surge shots. 

Finka boost will decrease the aim down time for all weapons. When used in combination with shield operators, they can aim down the sights very fast when behind the cover of a shield. 

Finka Adrenal shot also provide a health boost of 20hp. 

Finka can use her Adrenal shot to revive team mates who are down. 

Finka Adrenal shot will reduce the recoil of Attacker weapons to a huge amount in that duration. 

Finka is very useful when played aggressive, or when a team rushes into the site aggressively. 

When Finka ability is active, Attackers will move easily through Barbed Wire, recover faster from Stun grenades and Concussion Mines. 

Finka can prevent Caveira interrogation by reviving the downed Attacker instantly.

Smoke Gas grenades stick to surfaces and can be detonated remotely. 

Smoke Gas grenades release toxic content dealing critical damage. 

Smoke Gas grenades damages 15 health points every second regardless of armor. 

Smoke Gas grenades can be used to kill downed Attackers. 

Smoke Gas grenades can be detonated on impact like nitro cells. 

Smoke Gas grenades release toxic gas which is dense and deny vision through it. This can be used for rotation or escaping from Attackers if caught. 

Using Smoke Gas grenades when Attackers are walking through Barbed Wire will surely down them and kill them as they take more damage the longer they are in the gas. 

Smoke gas grenades deal more damage per second to Attackers if Finka nanobot is active on the Attackers. 

When Attackers try to plant defuser with the help of smoke, Smoke can use his gas grenades to deny the plant. 

Smoke shotgun can be used to create rotation holes between sites.

Mute Jammer are portable devices and has a range of 5m. 

Mute Jammer disrupt all Attacker gadget that are activated remotely. 

Mute Jammers will prevent Thermite from activating his Exothermic Charge. 

Mute Jammers will prevent Hibana from activating her XKAIROS. 

Mute Jammers will precent Fuze from activating his Cluster Charges. 

Mute Jammers will prevent Blitz from using his Flash Shield. 

Mute Jammer can disrupt Jackal Eyenox making him blind. 

Mute Jammer can prevent Defenders from being called by Dokkaebi Logic Bomb. 

Mute Jammer can disrupt Attacker drones and prevent it from collecting information. 

When Defenders are near Mute Jammer, their phones will not ring if Dokkaebi calls. 

When placed between two reinforced walls, Mute Jammer prevent Thermite and Hibana from destroying the wall as their gadgets cannot be detonated. 

In preparation phase if a drone is jammed by Mute jammer and is not destroyed. The Attacker will not be able to see the feed from other Attacker drones. 

Mute Signal Disruptor are placed in doorways to prevent drones from entering the room. Place them in a way Attackers will not be able to shoot them. 

If Defenders are near Mute Jammer when Lion uses his Drone, they will not be detected even if they move.

Castle has 3 Armor Panels which he can barricade in doors and windows. They are bulletproof and are very much tougher than normal barricades. 

Armor Panel once barricaded, can be pulled down by any defender. They will return back to Castle. 

Castle helps slowing down Attackers and deny line of sights into rooms that are more vulnerable for Defenders. 

Defenders cannot make hole in Armor Panels except with Vigil shotgun. 

Armor Panel when pre-hit 11 times, can be used to make surprise run-outs to kill Attackers. 

Impact Grenades can destroy Armor Panels. 

Armor Panels are very effective in preventing the Attackers from rushing into the objective. 

When Attacker tries to melee attack Panels, Defenders can use nitro cell on the Panel to kill them,or shoot Attackers in legs exposed under the Panel. 

Armor Panels can be used to deny entry for Attackers into the objective.

Pulse can detect Attacker in proximity using the Heartbeat Sensor. 

Pulse is very useful in gaining Attacker movement intel for other Defenders. 

Pulse can detect Attackers from below and use nitro cell on the floor to kill them. 

Pulse can detect Attackers and shoot through surfaces to kill them. 

Pulse is a effective roamer who can detect enemies and outsmart them with creative plays. 

Pulse is very effective in analyzing the Attacker movement and their plan. 

Pulse is useful in detecting the position of Defuser plant when Attackers use smoke and plant. 

Pulse is effective in detecting the position where Thermite is planting the Exothermic charge. 

Pulse is very effective in a one versus one situation. He can detect where the last Attacker is and can outplay easily. 

Pulse can prevent defuser from being planted by playing below the floor. If any Defender is trying to plant, Pulse can detect and shoot them from below the floor. This works only when Attackers plant on floors which are destructible.

Stim Pistol heals Defenders for 40 hp when hit with it. 

Doc can pick himself up when down using his Stim Pistol. 

Stim Pistol revives a person who is down with 75 hp. 

Doc is very effective in playing Anchor Roles. 

When used on a downed Defender it gets them up without any help from other Defenders. 

Stim Pistol has pinpoint hipfire accuracy. It can be shot without aiming down. 

Stim Pistol has ability to overheal Defenders. It is useful when trying to play aggresively against a group of Attackers. 

The overheal decays at rate of 1 hp per second until baseline health point 100 is achieved. 

Doc has 3 shots in Multiplayer and 5 in Terrorist Hunt mode. 

Doc Stim pistol can provide health to Attackers too. 

Instead of using Stim Pistol to revive downed Defenders, if Doc tries to revive them manually and later provide them a Stim shot he can provide more health points.

Rook Armor Plates come in a Satchel. It has five armors in it. 

Rook Armor reduces 20 percent damage. 

Rook Armor does not affect headshot kills. 

Rook is very effective in playing Anchor Roles. 

Rook Armor plates can be worn by both Attackers and Defenders. 

Rook cannot pick up Armor Satchel once dropped. 

When you are wearing the Armor Plates, it always put you in a downed state instead of being killed. But you will die if you are shot again after being downed. 

Operators wearing Rook Armor can only be downed once per round. Next time, instead of being downed, they will be killed. 

When downed wearing a armor, the bleedout is doubled for 120 secs. 

Operators will die from meelee even when Armor Plates are worn.

Kapkan uses Entry Denial Device - EDD to damage unwary Attackers. 

EDD deal a damage of 60hp. 

They can be attached to frames of doors and windows. 

The laser of EDD cannot be seen. 

EDD can be placed in multiple heights on door frames. It depends on where you are looking when placing them. 

When placed wisely they can deal great damage to Attackers. 
\Deploy EDD and barricade doors and windows. This way any careless Attacker trying to break the barricade will trigger the EDD. 
\Deploy EDD and place a shield in doorways. This way any careless Attacker trying to jump over the shield will trigger the EDD. 

Kapkan can help in providing intel for Roamers on Attacker movement. Place EDD in locations where Attackers might push. When those EDD are detonated, Kapkan will be notified of it. This way he can learn about Attacker presence in that area. 

EDD when placed in doors to the objective can prevent Attackers from rushing into the objective. 

Kapkan must be careful not to be detected by drones while placing EDD mines otherwise Attackers may find them and destroy. 

Find good locations to place the EDD mines where Attackers will not detect them.

The LMG gives a high level of protection against Attackers who are pushing into the objective.. 

Place a normal Defender shield in front of the LMG. This prevents Attackers from shooting the Defender who is using the LMG. The LMG can be used for a great suppressive fire at entrances. 

Tachanka can deploy LMG at any location. It can be picked up and relocated as well. 

When unmanned , LMG can be used by any Defender or even Attacker. 

The Mounted LMG has a protective shield on the top that protects head of Operator who is using it. 

The LMG Mount has a 60 degrees limitation in any directions. When using the LMG, any Attacker shooting from off angle cannot be targeted. 

The LMG has greater destruction power, it can destroy surfaces to create new lines of sights and provide support to Defenders in that area.

Jager is a powerful Defense Operator. 

Jager provide anti grenade support using his Magpies - Active Defense System - ADS. 

ADS detects and destroys any projectile coming in its line of sight. 

Jager have 3 Magpies. They are placed right next to windows or doors to prevent Attackers from using remote detonated devices into the objective from outside. 

Jager ADS is very effective in protecting Defenders against Fuze Cluster Charges. 

Jager ADS is very effective in preventing Attackers from destroying Shields and Barbed Wire near windows and doors using Frag Grenade. Place the ADS near the window or door and they will destroy the Attacker Frag grenades. 

Jager ADS can be very effective in protecting Defenders against Attacker Frag grenades when they are anchoring in a location. 

One ADS can destroy upto three Attacker gadgets. 

ADS can destroy Frag grenades, Stun Grenades, Smoke Grenades, Ash CREM, Thatcher EMPs, Grenades from Fuze Cluster Charge, Ying Candela,Zofia Impact and Concussion grenades.

Bandit can place Shock Wire on all metallic gadgets, Barbed wires, Shields, Reinforced walls and more. 

Bandit Shock Wire can be identified with sparks coming out of metal objects. 

Bandit Shock Wire will destroy Attacker gadgets when in contact with. 

Bandit shotgun is very effective at close range and can be used to create rotation holes in objective. 

Bandit Shock Wire will prevent Thermite from using his Exothermic Charge by destroying it. 

Bandit Shock Wire on reinforced walls will prevent Hibana XKAIROS from destroying the wall. This is commonly used on walls which are reinforced and a Mira Black mirror is placed. 

Defender gadgets can also be destroyed by Bandit Shock Wires. If any Defender gadget is in proximity to a Bandit wired wall, they will be destroyed. 

Bandit Shock wire has no effect on Echo Yokai drone. 

Bandit shocked Barbed wire will destroy any Attacker drone in contact with it. 

Attackers in contact with shock sparks will deal 10 damage per second. The shock from it will cause disorientation and will make the Attacker groan. 

One Shock Wire can electrify one Barbed Wire or one Shield or one Reinforced wall. 

It is possible for Bandit Shock Wire to get kills even after Bandit is dead.

Mira uses Black Mirrors that are deployed on walls that help Defenders create a one way view to the other side. 

They can be tactically used to defend a location. When needed the gas canister in Black Mirror can be destroyed causing the one way mirror to break thereby creating a murder hole that Defenders can use. 

Black Mirrors are much useful to prevent Bomb Defuser plant. Combine Mira with Smoke and you can deny plant in certain locations. 

Mira Black Mirrors can be places at head level or crouch level on reinforced and non reinforces walls. 

Reinforce one of two adjacent walls and place a Mira Black Mirror in the reinforced wall, Leaving the other wall soft. Fire when Attackers are in the front. 

Reinforce two adjacent walls and place Mira Black mirrors on both walls. Open any one Black mirror. With the help of mirror which is not broken, aim and fire at Attackers using the hole present in the broken Black mirror. 

Once deployed Mira Black Mirrors cannot be removed from walls. 

After Mira Black mirrors are deployed, using Shotgun break the surfaces to the left and right of the mirror otherside. This helps you get deeper angles to either sides. 

Mira can prevent Attackers from entering the objective with the help of her Black Mirrors. Attackers will hesitate to push objective if they encounter a Black mirror.

Valkyrie can throw upto three Black Eye cameras which extend three more camera feed to Defenders. 

Black Eyes can be thrown anywhere and they stick to the surface. 

Black Eyes cannot be thrown in places at the very end of map. This will destroy the cameras instantly. 

Black Eyes are gyroscopic and have 360 degree viewing angle if thrown to appropriate surfaces at correct angles. 

Black Eyes transmit color video footage with a blue tint as opposed to black and white footage of Defender cameras . 

Black Eyes are denoted by blue dots in Defenders camera UI. 

Black Eyes provide the most efficient form of intel for the Defenders. 

Black Eyes has a arc when thrown. They do not travel straight when thrown. Their throwing is similar when throwing a Nitro cell. 

Black Eyes help you plan your runouts on Attackers when they are not expecting.

Caveira is a powerful stealth operator. She is a powerful roaming Defender with her Silent Step ability. 

Caveira special ability allows her to interrogate a Attacker in 3 seconds when they are downed. After interrogation, she will kill them. 

Caveira Silent step ability allows her to move quieter than all. Caveira can use her Silent step for 10 seconds and it need to be recharged before using again. 

Caveira handgun Luison is a specially modified version that does a 99 hp damage at close range. It is guaranteed to put Attackers in a downed state when used. When shot at Attackers who are downed it will kill them. 

Caveira Silent Step will enable her to walk, sprint in a stealth approach, making very less noise compared to others. 

When Jackal is tracking Caveira, She can activate her Silent Step ability to prevent pinging of her location. 

When she uses her Silent Step, she will not make footstep tracks like other Defenders. 

Caveira is best used for flanking and to surprise Attackers from behind. 

Caveira is very effective in wasting the time of the Attackers. Effective roaming around the map will prevent Attackers from pushing the objective. Attackers will be worried about her and waste their time. 

When Caveira interrogates an Attacker, all the Attackers movement will be tracked in real time and will be shown to all the Defenders. 

When Caveira melee a Attacker when in Silent Step, the Attacker will be downed instead of being killed. 

It is very difficult to find a Caveira who is hiding in a dark spot. This works most of the time but not always. 

Caveira is well known to use her shotgun to create rotation holes and surprise Attackers in multiple angles

Echo uses his remotely controlled Yokai Drone to do recon on Attackers and disorient them with his Sonic blast. 

Echo can deploy the drone to higher locations while aiming at higher level. 

Yokai Drone can only stick to certain surfaces in ceiling. 

Yokai Drone cannot jump and can be moved vertically up to the ceiling and sticks to it. Yokai Drone can be move around the map like a normal drone. 

Yokai Drone has a 2 sec jump cooldown and is limited to jump distance of 5 m. 

Yokai drone when in ceiling will render it invisible but a little bit visible when closely seen. 

Yokai drone will blast an Attacker with sonic bursts which will disorient them and make their movements dizzy. This disorientation is very effective if Attacker tries to run away after being attacked by the drone as it worsens the effect much more . 

Camera feed from Yokai can only be seen by Echo, Even if Echo is dead, he will be able to access the camera feed from his drone. 

Blast range is 14m for Echo drone, The blast has no travel time and is instantaneous. 

Yokai blast need to be targeted to the Attackers to cause disorientation effect. Using the blast on surfaces near the Attacker will yield less result in orientation. 

Yokai drone cannot scan Attackers like other Defender cameras. 

Yokai drone blast can have interesting effect on Attackers movement, it will cancel action they are performing like planting a Defuser and more. 

Echo drone can be used to prevent the Attacker from planting the defuser as it cancels their action. This is very useful at end of round since denying the Defuser plant will make the Defenders win the round at last seconds. 

Echo drone effect will disable the effect of Finka nanobots to Attackers. 

Yokai will lose signal if it goes out of Defenders area, You will have 3 secs before you lose signal. Once Yokai drone loses signal, it cannot be moved. Echo must go outside and pick it up to recover it. 

Echo is immune to Dokkaebi Logic Bomb Call. Dokkaebi cannot access Echo drone after hacking into Defender network. 

Yokai drone can touch Bandit Shock Wire and will not be destroyed by it. 

Be careful while placing Defender Shield in doors I will prevent Yokai Drone from moving outside the room and vice versa.

Frost uses her Welcome Mats to set traps for Attackers. When Attackers come in contact with it, they will be downed in a instant and will not be able to move. 

If Attacker was already in a downed state and was revived earlier, stepping on a Welcome Mat will kill them instantly. 

Welcome Mat, when it catches Attackers will make a very distinct sound of "clank" to notify the Defenders about it. 

When Attackers are caught in a Welcome Mat, any Attacker who is nearby can revive them by helping them get up on their feet but downed Attacker will only have 50hp after they are revived. 

Welcome Mats are best placed in dark places where Attackers will not see them. 

Frost Mats are very useful when placed next to Windows and Door as rushing Attacker will not notice it and get trapped. 

Welcome Mats combine best with Defenders who have Shield because, Shields can be placed in the doorway with Welcome Mat behind it. When Attackers vault the Shield, they will be trapped in the Mat. 

Attackers cannot move when downed in a Welcome Mat. 

Welcome Mats are best placed on top of stairs as Attackers will not see the trap as they move up the step and will be trapped. 

When Attackers are trapped in Frost Mat, they can be killed from below or above the floor by shooting at them. This require good map knowledge to execute. Before placing a Frost Mat, shoot the floor and make a hole. This way, when anyone is trapped in the Mat, they can be shot from below using that hole as a cue for location. 

Frost Mats are very effective in trapping high speed operators when they are rushing the objective.

Lesion uses his Gu Mines to cause damage to Attackers when they step on it. It causes initial damage of 10 hp and 8 hp per 2 seconds until removed. 

When Attackers are removing Gu Mines, they dont have their Weapons in hand and are very vulnerable in that period. 

If Attackers are in radius of 1m to the Gu Mine, It will damage the Attacker. 

Gu Mines are very effective to prevent Attackers from rushing into the objective sites. 

When poisoned by Gu Mines, the Attacker cannot sprint. 

Lesion is only Defender who can see the Gu Mines where they are placed. When Attacker comes in contact with the mines, the icon of the mine disappear thus providing valuable intel to Lesion. This can be effective in shooting Attackers through walls when Gu Mines are placed at certain locations. 

Gu Mines are cloaked, but can be seen if one notice closely. 

Lesion start with 1 Gu Mine at start of round and acquires one every 30 seconds. 

Gu Mines are very effective in preventing Shield operators from pushing to the objective. If they come in contact with a Gu Mine, they will take a lot of damage until they remove it. 

Stepping on a Gu Mine cancels the boost provided by Finka to Attackers. 

When Attackers step on a Gu Mine, Defenders will hear a clank sound cue.

Ela Grizmot Mines can stick to any surface at any height. 

Grizmot Mines detonate when a Attacker is close by. It cancels their current action, disorients them, limit visual and disrupt their hearing. 

Unlike when disoriented by Echo Yokai, moving around with Grizmot Mines triggered will not worsen the effect. 

Ela is a powerful roamer. When used correct, her Grizmot mines can be used to secure kills easily. Place the mines in areas where you guess the Attackers will push. When the mine is triggerred, kill the Attacker easily when they are disoriented. 

Disoriented with Ela or Echo one after other will cancel the previous effect. Only one disorientation can be in place at a time. 

Ela mines will cancel most actions done by Attackers but Ela mines will not cancel Attackers action of pulling out needle from Lesion Gu Mines. 

Ela when downed has another Concussion Mines in reserve which she can detonate to disorient nearby Attacker to give other Defenders a chance to save her. 

Ela recovers at a pace two times the speed of other Defenders when in contact with Zofia Concussion grenades. 

Rook can increase the time of bleeding when Ela is down so she can detonate the last Concussion a bit later selectively targeted at Attackers who come nearby. 

Grizmot Mines detonate only if Attackers are in line of sight of the mine. 

Grizmot Mines blast radius is 6m while its proximity detonation radius is 4m. 

Ela uses her Grizmot Mines to defend her close vicinity. When someone triggers the mine, She pushes hard and gets the kill. 

Grizmot Mines can also be used to collect intel about Attackers movement. If the Attackers enter a particular room in which the mine was placed, She will know about it after its detonation.

Vigil uses his ERC7 video disruptor to erase himself from showing up in cameras and drones. 

ERC7 takes a second to make Vigil fully visible to the cameras and drones. 

Vigil ERC7 will deplete in 12 seconds. 

Vigil ERC7 will take 6 seconds to recharge. 

ERC7 has a time duration in which it can be active, It need to be recharged to be used again. 

Vigil ERC7 will be disabled when he is reinforcing a wall. 

When Vigil fires a gun or affects the environment, The ERC7 will stop the mechanism and make him visible. 

When Vigil is in a area under cloak, the camera feed will have a unique interference border to denote his presence in the room. 

Vigil EERC will turn the red light of drones into white when jamming them. 

Video Disruptor ERC7 has a range of 12m. 

Vigil when disrupting Attacker drones will make the drone light change from Red to White. 

Vigil can be very effective in roaming and can waste a lot of time for Attackers. 

Vigil cannot be droned out by Attackers, His exact location can never be found by Attackers until they wait for his ERC7 to deplete charge.

Sledge can create new line of sight for Glaz and Glaz can provide support for him from long range. 

Sledge works well with Thermite, Buck and Hibana. They all combined can create havoc by destroying everything (walls, barricades, floors and hatches). They are the defenders nightmare. 

Sledge works well with Jackal to track any enemies below the floor and create holes in floors to kill them from above. 

Sledge can help Thatcher to help him throw EMPs at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls. 

Sledge can help Ying to help her throw Candelas at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls. 

Sledge works well with Buck ,Ash and Hibana to break the surrounding walls and floors. 

Sledge can help Capitao to help him fire arrows at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls.

Thatcher works well with Hibana and Thermite to help open walls if they are jammed with Mute Signal Disruptors or Bandit Shock Wires. 

Thatcher works well with IQ to detect defender gadgets and eliminate them using Thatcher EMP. 

Twitch can help Thatcher save his EMPs by destroying gadgets with her drone. 

Thatcher can combine with Stun grenade operators to prevent EMP being destroyed by Jager Active Defense Systems by using Stun grenades to waste the Active Defense Systems. 

Thatcher can use the EMP to help an aggressive Attacker like Ash, by clearing out the way and removing any Defender gadgets like Gu Mines, Ela Grizmot mines and more.

Ash works well with other three speed operators Hibana, Capitao, IQ in a very aggressive manner to rush the objective and kill all Defenders. 

Ash works well with Jackal to track any enemies below the floor and create holes in floors to kill them from above. 

Ash can help Thatcher to help him throw EMPs at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls. 

Ash can help Ying to help her throw Candelas at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls. 

Ash can help Capitao to help him fire arrows at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls.

 

Ash works well with Buck ,Sledge and Hibana to break the surrounding walls and floors.

Thermite works well with Hibana and they combined can destroy most of the walls and hatches. 

Thatcher can help Thermite if the area to be destroyed is jammed by Mute Signal Disruptors or Bandit Shock Wired. Thatcher can remove them with his EMP. 

Twitch can help remove the Mute Signal Disruptor or Bandit Shock Wires using her Shock drones. 

Zofia can help Thermite in certain places and help disorient Bandit via drone hole and prevent him from doing the Bandit trick. 

IQ can help Thermite to see if Bandit is tricking the other side of wall. IQ can detect the Bandit holding the battery. 

Thermite can open walls for Glaz to cover from long distance. 

Sledge, Buck, IQ can help Thermite in certain places to kill Bandit via drone hole with Grenades if he is in close proximity to the drone hole and is active Bandit tricking.

Twitch Drones can be used to distract Defenders while other Attackers are pushing aggressive. 

Twitch works best with Thatcher and IQ at taking out Defender gadgets as a whole. 

Twitch can help Hibana in removing Mute Jammers or Bandit Shock Wires on the other side of the wall. 

Twitch can help Thermite in removing Mute Jammers or Bandit Shock Wires on the other side of the wall. 

Twitch is very useful in removing Jager ADS which destorys projectiles into the room. This is useful when any Attacker is using a projectile into the room and the ADS is preventing them from doing so.

Montagne works with Ash,Thermite and Hibana who can create entry for him. 

Montagne and other Attacker who have smokes can be combined to perform a methodical Smoke plant with Ying, where all use their smokes and Ying uses her candelas to perform the plant in the confusion. Blitz can cover the Defuser at short range while Glaz covers it at long range. 

Montagne can be used with other Attacker to provide front cover for them while they are trying to plant the Defuser.

Thermite, Hibana, Sledge and Buck can create new lines of sight to help Glaz cover from long distance. 

Glaz and other Attackers who have smoke grenades can be combined to perform a methodical Smoke plant It is very hard to deny. Blitz can cover the Defuser at short range while Glaz covers it at long range.

Fuze works well with Jackal to track any enemies below and fuzing them from above. 

Fuze works well with Montagne to lock Defenders into a room and fuzing them from above. 

Fuze can be combined with Lion to lock Defenders into a room and fuzing them to kill them all or injure them. 

Fuze can help cover defuser after plant by pre placing cluster charges above defuser and activating them when Defenders try to defuse.

Blitz can be used to smoke plant the defuser and cover it in short range When combined with Glaz, Montagne and Ying, They can easily plant Defuser. 

Blitz can use his smoke grenades to help Glaz with his thermal scope.

IQ can help Thatcher and Thermite in detecting if Bandit is tricking for Thermite. 

IQ can help Thatcher identify areas where gadgets are placed to throw EMP at. 

IQ works well with Hibana and Thermite. She can detect the Bandit Battery and Mute Jammers. Using her gadget she can destroy them from above or below the floor. 

IQ can help any Attacker identify any nitro cell traps Defenders have made. 

IQ works well with Dokkaebi, When she calls, IQ can detect the phones if Defenders are trying to switch them off.

Buck can combine with Thermite, Hibana and Sledge They combined can destroy almost all surfaces and create chaos. 

Buck can create new lines of sight for Glaz to cover from a distance. 

Buck can also be used to destroy Mira Black Mirror by shooting from below the floor or above the floor. It requires good map knowledge. 

Buck can help Thatcher to help him throw EMPs at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls. 

Buck can help Ying to help her throw Candelas at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls. 

Buck can help Capitao to help him fire arrows at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls.

Blackbeard works well with Shield operators like Fuze, Blitz and Montagne. That is a lot of shields to deal with. 

Blackbeard is very effective with Ash, Zofia, Thermite, Hibana. They can create holes for Blackbeard to peek into. 

Blackbeard is very useful to hold flank angle. It is very difficult to kill a blackbeard when his body is not visible.

Capitao Smoke can be used to help plant Defuser and is best combined with other Attackers who have smoke grenades. With all their smokes Defenders can be made unaware of the Defuser plant location. 

Capitao can use his smoke grenades to help Glaz with his thermal scope. 

Capitao can be combined with Buck and Sledge. Buck or Sledge can create new line of sight in floor and Capitao can use it to fire his bolts. 

Capitao can be used aggressively to rush the objective with Ash, Hibana and IQ .

Thermite along with Hibana can open holes in walls when under Bandit trick Use X-KAIROS on both walls and place Exothermic charge on one side. Denote them both at same time, this way Bandit cannot prevent any one side from opening. 

Hibana with Capitao, Ash and IQ can be used aggressively and rush into objective.

Jackal when combined with Dokkaebi is very useful in finding the Roamers. 

Jackal can be used with Zofia. Find the room in which the roamer is present and use Zodia Concussion grenades in it. The Defender will be disoriented and can be killed easily. 

Fuze and Jackal can locate the roamer and drive them out of the room using their gadgets. Find the location of the roamer using Jackal and palce Cluster charges in that room.

Ying works best with Attackers who have smoke grenades to do a Defuser Plant that is hard to deny. Use Montagne and Blitz to cover for Defuser. 

Ying works with Fuze, When Ying blinds Defenders, Fuze can detonate the Cluster Charges to kill the unaware Defenders. 

Sledge, Ash, Zofia and Buck can help Ying to help her throw Candelas at critical location by creating new lines of sight in floors or walls. 

Thatcher can help Ying in removing Jager ADS before she throws the Candela.

Zofia works well with Buck, Sledge, Hibana and Thermite. They all combined can destroy most of the walls and floors. 

Zofia can help create new lines of sight for Glaz to cover from long distance. 

Zofia can help Blackbeard get new angles by opening the soft walls. 

Zofia can be used to disorient Bandit if Bandit tricking. This is possible if there is a drone hole next to where Bandit is tricking.

Dokkaebi works with IQ to detect phones when Defenders are trying to switch them off. 

Dokkaebi works well with Attackers like Ash, Hibana, Capitao and IQ. While Dokkaebi calls Defenders, they can rush the objective and kill the Defenders who are trying to switch off their phones. 

Dokkaebi and Jackal combined can be very effective in finding the roamer and killing them.

Finka abililty is very powerful when combined with Attackers having Light Machine Guns and Machine Pistols as their recoils are reduced to large extent when Finka boost is active. 

Finka can help Attackers recover from Ela Mines by using her ability. 

Finka Boost will help all Attackers move through the Barbed wire easily. 

Finka boost will help any shield Attacker aim down the sight in a instant. This can be used to instant headshot the Defenders. 

Finka can be used well with Attackers having Stun Grenades. Finka boost will recover Attackers from the flash faster.

Lion ability works well when the Defuser has been planted. Using his ability will detect Defenders approaching the Defuser. 

Lion works well with Jackal to track the position of Roamers and resist their movement. 

Fuze can be combined with Lion to lock defenders in a room and using Cluster charges in that room to kill them or injure them a lot. 

Lion works well with Thermite to detect the Bandit if he is Bandit tricking.

Smoke can be combined with Defenders having Barbed wire. Using smoke gas grenades when Attackers are moving through barbed wire will deal them with more damage as they stay more in the toxic smoke. 

Smoke works well with Mira. Staying behind the cover of Mira Black Mirrors, Smoke can prevent Attackers from planting defuser by using his Smoke toxic gas grenades over the Defuser spot.

Mute works well with Mira. When placed behind wall where Mira Black mirror is present, it will prevent Attacker from opening the wall. This is very effective in preventing Hibana from opening Mira walls. 

Mute works well with Bandit, Mute can be used to waste Thatcher EMP so that Bandit can later Shock wire the wall and Attacker have no way to open the shocked wall. 

Mute works well with Castle Armor panels. If placed in range of the armor panel, Attackers will not be able to breach the panel because their detonation device will be jammed.

Castle can be used with Pulse to detect enemy movements beyond the Armor Panel and take necessary action. 

Mira strategies can be used with Castle to protect Mira while she uses her Black Mirror to the advantage of the Defenders.

Pulse can be combines with other nitro cell operators to pre-place them and detonate by communicating with team mates. 

Pulse along with Caveira, Ela, Jager and Vigil can be used for aggressive roaming. 

Pulse can be combined with Echo. Echo can aid Pulse in the roaming with help of his Yokai drone. Echo can use his Yokai drone to detect enemy movement and relay that information to the roamers. 

Pulse can provide information about Attackers outside to other Defenders. This can be used for run out kills while Attackers are rapelling. 

Pulse can be used with Bandit to detect where Thermite is placing his Exothermic charge and help in Bandit trick.

Doc works better with Rook to greatly improve the armor characteristics of Defenders. 

Doc works best with Rook because wearing a rook armor will down the Defender before being killed by Attacker, Doc when timed correctly can save the downed Defender.

Rook works best with Doc who can revive Defenders when they are down. 

Rook works best with any operators who can anchor with him in the site.
Kapkan works well with Roamers and help them know if a Attacker is nearby. Detonation of a EDD device will alert Kapkan about a nearby Attacker. Kapkan can pass this information to the roamers.\n\n

Tachanka can combine with Doc and Rook to hold the objective from the Attackers. They combined can deal high amount of gunfire. 

Tachnka works well with Defender who have shield. Placing deployable shield in front of Tachanka LMG will cover him from gunfire. 

Tachank works well with Defenders who have Barbed wire. Placing Barbed wire in places where the Tachanka LMG is covering will deny the push of Attackers and make them more prone to gunfire from the LMG. 

Tachanka works well with Jager, where his ADS will prevent anyone from destroying the shield from distance. ADS will block the incoming grenades targeted at destroying the shield.

Jager works well with Defenders who are anchoring a corner and prevent Attackers from using frag grenades at them. 

Jager can be combined with Echo. Echo can aid Jager in the roaming with help of his Yokai drone. Echo can use his Yokai drone to detect enemy movement and relay that information to the roamers. 

Jager works well with other roamers Ela, Pulse and Caveira and Vigil to prevent Attackers from approaching the objective asn wasting the time of Attackers.

Bandit can be a effective roamer given his high agility. He works well with other roamers like Pulse, Ela, Jager and Caveira. 

Bandit Shock wires can be used with Castle Armor Panels with Barbed wire underneath to deal damage to Attackers who come for breaching the Panels. 

Bandit can be combined with Echo. Echo can aid Bandit in the roaming with help of his Yokai drone. Echo can use his Yokai drone to detect enemy movement and relay that information to the roamers. 

Bandit can combine with Mira. Placing a Bandit battery on the reinforced wall will prevent it from being open by Hibana or Thermite.

Mira walls can be best covered from hot breachers like Thermite and Hibana by using Bandit Shock Wire on the wall. 

Mira works well with Defenders who have deployable shield. Placing a shield on the door will prevent any Twitch drone from entering the objective to open the Black mirror. 

Mira works well with Mute who can help in preventing the Mira wall from being open by Hibana or Thermite. Mute Jammers will prevent Hibana or Thermite from activating the charge.

Valkyrie works well with Defenders having Nitro cellsBlack Eyes are very useful for tracking Attackers above the floor and killing them with the help of Nitro cell to the floor. This requires good map knowledge to implement. 

Black Eyes Cameras can be great source for information for Roamers especially Caveira. 

When Black Eye cameras are hacked by Dokkaebi, Vigil cannot be seen in it

Caveira works best with Valyrie who can help her providing intel about Attacker movement with help of her Black Eye Cameras. 

Caveira works best with Pulse who can provide her with the intel of Attacker movement. 

Caveira works well with other roamers like Pulse, Vigil, Ela and Jager. They can waste the time of Attackers. 

Caveira can be combined with Echo. Echo can aid Caviera in the roaming with help of his Yokai drone. Echo can use his Yokai drone to detect enemy movement and relay that information to the roamers. 

Caveira works well with Lesion, If Gu Mines down any Attacker, Caveira can interrogate the Attacker who is downed.

Yokai drone when combined with Ela can produce a series of disorientation to Attackers in group. This will render them vulnerable to any roamers who are nearby. 

Ela and Yokai drone effect cannot be user on the Attacker at same time. Only one effect will be active at a time. 

Echo can be very helpful in collecting intel and assisting Roamers in Attacker movements.

Frost works well with Defenders who have deployable shield. Placing frost Mat next to shield will down the Attacker who tries to vault the shield. 

Smoke can help in killing Attackers who are trapped in Frost Map by using his smoke gas grenade from longer distance. 

Frost works well with Lesion Gu Mines, When placed in close proximity to a Frost Mat, Attackers can be killed instantly.

Lesion works well with Frost, When Gu Mines are placed close to Welcome Mat, it can kill an Attacker instantly. Be careful not to place the Gu Mines very close to Welcome Mat which will disable the effect of Gu Mines. n
Gu Mines work well with Kapktan EDD, When placed in near proximity to it, it will cause a total damage of 70hp and more. 

Gu Mines work with Ela traps, This allows the Attacker to be disoriented and poisoned at the same time. 

Gu Mines can down Attackers if they are not careful which provides opportunity for Caveira to interrogate them. 

Lesion Gu Mines can be used to detect Attacker Movement above and with little coordination with Nitro cell operators, It can used to blow up Attackers from below.

Echo when working with Ela can cause a set of disorientation to group of Attackers who are pushing in same area. 

Ela can be combined with Echo. Echo can aid Ela in the roaming with help of his Yokai drone. Echo can use his Yokai drone to detect enemy movement and relay that information to the roamers. 

Disoriented with Ela or Echo one after other will cancel the previous effect Only one disorientation can be in place at a time.

Vigil works well with roamers like Pulse, Jager, Ela and Caveira. They combined can waste the time of Attackers. 

Vigil can be combined with Echo. Echo can aid Vigil in the roaming with help of his Yokai drone. Echo can use his Yokai drone to detect enemy movement and relay that information to the roamers. 

Vigil shotgun can create small hole in Castle Armor Panel, This can be used to kill unwary Attackers.

Pulse can be used to detect the movement of Sledge as he moves around breaking stuff. 

Defenders can reinforce walls and hatches to prevent Sledge from breaking it. 

Roamers are very effective in flanking Sledge from behind while he is busy breaking stuff. 

Valkyrie can spy on Sledge with the help of her Black Eye Cameras. 

Echo drone can be used to disorient Sledge and prevent him from breaking floors and walls.

Jager Active Defense Systems can destroy EMPs when caught in its line of sight while throwing. 

Echo drone most times will be very high in ceiling and will not be affected by EMP as their range is short. 

EMP do not affect mechanical devices like Mira Black Mirror or Frost Welcome Mat. 

Place Defender gadgets in places where it will not be affected by Thatcher EMPs. 

When Thatcher throws an EMP, Defenders can easily track his position because the light from EMP will make the angle thrown from easily detectable.

CREM breaches can be electrified and are destroyed if they come in contact with Bandit Shock Wired Shields or Barbed Wire. 

Jager Active Defense System will destroy the CREM breaches if in line of sight. 

Ash CREM cannot destoy walls if they are reinforced by Defenders. 

Ash rushing into the objective can be prevented with the help of Gu Mines, Ela Proximity mines, Frost Welcome Mats,Castle Armor Panels and Kapkan EDDs.

Thermite Exothermic Charges can be jammed by Mute Signal Disruptor. 

Exothermic Charges can be destroyed by Bandit Shock Wires. This counter by Bandit is called the Bandit Trick while he actively places a Shock Wire to the wall while Thermite sets an Exothermic Charge. The Exothermic charge will be destroyed by the Battery. 

Exothermic Charges show visible sparks on other side of wall to denote its activation and detonation. 

Pulse can be used to detect the position of placement of Thermite Exothermic charges and help in Bandit trick. 

Valkyrie can be used to spy Thermite with her Black Eye cameras and help in Bandit trick. 

Mira can be used on the wall to see where Thermite is placing his Exothermic charges and help in Bandit trick.

Defender Shields blocking entrances eliminate the movement of Twitch Drone into the room. This is a reliable method to protect Mira Black Mirrors. 

Twitch Drones get destroyed if it comes in contact with Bandit Shoch Wires. 

Twitch Drones are jammed when in contact with Mute Signal Disruptors.

Montagne is vulnerable from behind. 

Montagne is comparatively slower than heavy operators. 

Montagne is only covered 80 degrees and not 90 degrees at both sides when his shield is active and is vulnerable a little bit at the sides. 

Ela Grizmot mines can lower his fully extended shield when in contact. 

Echo Yokai can disorient him and lower his fully extended shield when in contact. 

Montagne is louder when moving like other shield operators. 

Frost Mats will injure Montagne even when his shield is fully extended. 

Bandit shock wires will damage him when he touches it. 

Smoke Gas grenades are ideal to prevent Montagne from entering sites and push him back. 

A nitro cell thrown behind Montagne when detonated will down or kill him. 

Lesion Gu Mines are ideal to prevent Montagne from pushing forward into the objective. Once in contact with a Gu Mine, He is be downed of killed if he does not remove it.

Glaz is very vulnerable in short range as his weapon OTS03 is hard to use in short range. 

Castle Armor Panels can used to close entrances to objectives and prevent Glaz from peeking from long distance. 

Reinforcing critical walls will prevent Glaz from breaking it and peeking inside. 

Jager ADS can destroy Smoke grenades from Glaz and prevent him from using his Thermal Scope.

Mute Signal Disruptor can jam the Cluster charge from being activated. 

There is a distinct sound made when placing the Cluster Chargess. This audio cue can be used by Defenders to vacate the room or shoot the charge. 

Jager Active Defense systems can destroy pellets as they come in line of sight to them. 

Reinforcing walls and hatches will prevent Fuze from placing his Cluster Charges. 

Fuze when placing his Cluster Charges is very vulnerable and cannot defend himself. Roamers can locate Fuze easily based on where the Cluster charge was deployed. 

Pulse is very effective in detecting Fuze with his Heartbeat Scanner. Pulse can closely follow Fuze and kill him in cover.

Blitz shield moves away left when melee attacked to the front leaving Blitz open and vulnerable in the front, He must quickly turn right to bring the shield in front of him to prevent any frontal damage. 

Mute Signal Disruptor will jam Blitz Flash Shield if in its radius. 

Gu Mines are very effective in preventing Blitz from pushing aggressively into objective. 

Ela Grizmot mines help prevent Blitz from pushing aggressively. 

Echo Yokai Drone can be used to disorient and distract Blitz. 

Kapkan traps prevent Blitz from entering objective. 

Frost Mats will down Blitz when he is in contact with it. 

Castle Armor panels can be used to deny entry access to Blitz into the objective. 

Nitro cells on doorways and windows can be used to prevent Blitz from entering them. As Blitz cannot shoot it, If he enters he can be killed easily.

IQ can only use her pistol when she scans for Defender gadgets. The pistol is very limited in terms of firing power so she is very vulnerable in that time period. \n\nValkyrie Black eyes are very useful in detecting IQ.

Buck is vulnerable to roaming Defenders while destroying walls and floors if not careful, especially Caveira. 

Defenders can reinforce walls and floors to prevent Buck from opening them. 

Pulse can be used to detect the movement of Buck as he moves around breaking stuff.

Vigil shotgun will break the shield of Blackbeard. 

Ela submachine gun is very aggressive to deal Blackbeard . 

Smoke SMG and Mira Vector are effective weapons to deal Blackbeard. 

Blackbeard can be killed easily if shot in legs and body. 

Never peek a Blackbeard unless you are confident you can kill him. You are at a great disadvantage by peeking him. 

Castle Armor Panels are very useful in preventing Blackbeard from peeking the windows and other angles.

Nitro cell is very effective to use in smoke and deny Defuser plant if Capitao is trying to smoke and plant. 

Lesion Gu Mines are effective in preventing Capitao from rushing into the objective. 

Ela Grizmot mines are effective in preventing Capitao from rushing into the objective. 

Kapkan traps are effective in denying Capitao the entrance into objective. 

Frost Mats are effective in trapping Capitao who rushes into objective. 

If you are cornered with a Asphyxiating Bolt, try to find alternative location and relocate quickly.

Mute Signal Disruptors prevent you from detonating X-KAIROS pellets. 

X-KAIROS pellets will be destoyed if is in contct with Bandit Shock wire. 

X-KAIROS pellets can be destroyed by gunfire or explosives. Defenders can use nitro cell or impact grenade to destroy the pellet in activation and prevent it from opening walls, floors and hatches.

Jackal Eyenox will be disrupted when he is near a Mute Jammer. 

Jackal works well with Sledge, Buck to track any enemies below the floor and create holes in floors to kill them from above. 

Caveira is a direct counter to Jackal, Eventhough she can be tracked by him, When she enters Silent Step, Her location will not be shown like other Defenders. 

Caveira, When she is being tracked by Jackal, At the time of ping, If she enables her Silent step, She will not be tracked like other Defenders. 

Eyenox cannot be turned ON or OFF while holding a hostage. 

Mute Signal Disruptors will interfere with his Eyenox causing static effect, which almost makes him blind.

Jager Active Defense Systems are capable of destoying it when thrown as a whole. 

Barbed wires will reduce Candela rolling speed. 

Bandit Shock Wires is capable of destroying Candelas when in contact with. 

Defenders looking into the site with the help of Cameras will not be blinded if Candela is in the feed of the camera.

Ela is resistant to Zofia Concussion effects, allowing her to recover twice as fast as other Defenders. 

Jager Active Defense System can take out Zofia grenades if they are not detonated when coming into line of sight of the ADS. 

Defenders can reinforce walls and floors to prevent Zofia from opening them.

When Logic Bomb calls are activated, Defenders can try to hide and switch it off to prevent it from ringing. 

Doekkabi takes time to do calls or camera hacks, during this time she is very vulnerable and cannot move. 

The Defender phones are destroyable, which must be destroyed by another Defender if one dies to prevent Dokkaebi from hacking into the Defender Camera Network. 

When Defender cameras are hacked it displays a logo to show it is hacked for the Defenders, Defenders should shoot the hacked cameras to prevent giving away their location. 

Dokkaebi cannot call Echo and cannot hack into Echo Drone. 

When Defenders are in range of Mute Signal Disruptors, their phones will not ring when called. 

Bandit Shock Wires will destroy Defender phones when in contact. 

Vigil cannot be seen in hacked camera feed.

When under Finka boost Attackers will take more damage from Smoke toxic gas grenades. 

When under Finka boost Attackers will be detectable at a longer distance in Pulse Cardiac Sensor. 

Finka boost will be cancelled when hit by Echo Yokai drone or Lesion Gu mines.

Defenders are given a warning of 3 seconds before the scan takes place to position themselves in a safe place. 

Defenders can do all actions except position movement and not be detected by the EE-One-D drone. 

Defenders can move about freely and do all actions when they are in close proximity to a Mute Jammer.

Thatcher can destroy the gas grenades using his EMP. 

IQ can detect smoke gas grenades and shoot them. 

Twitch can destroy smoke gas grenades with her drones. 

High speed Attackers are more likely to escape through the smoke taking less damage than Low speed Attackers.

Thatcher can destroy Mute Disruptors when in Range. 

IQ can detect Mute Disruptors and shoot them through floors, windows and doors. 

Twitch can destroy them using her drone But if the drone is too close, it will be disrupted too. 

When drones are jammed by Mute Disruptors, Attackers can destroy the jammer and recover their drones. 

Remote detonation devices like Ash CREM, Zofia Impact grenades are not affected by Mute Signal Disruptors.

Effective ways to destroy Castle Armor Panels are using Breach charges, Ash CREM, Zofia Impact grenades, Frag grenades. 

Ash, Zofia and Hibana can destroy the Armor Panels from a safe distance. 

Sledge Breaching Hammer and Thermite charge can take down Armor Panels easily. 

Glaz can 12 shot Armor Panel with his sniper to destroy them. 

Fuze Cluster Charges, Ying Candela and Doekkabi shotgun create holes in Armor Panels for new line of sight. 

Armor Panel can be destroyed when melee attacked 12 times.

Thatchers EMP grenade will disable Heartbeat Sensor for a while before it can be reused. 

The sound Heartbeat Sensor emits will get louder as Attackers get close to it. 

Dokkaebi can call Defenders, thereby giving away the position of Pulse. 

Jackal is very effective in tracking Pulse footsteps and detecting his current position. 

IQ can detect Pulse when he is using the Heartbeat Sensor. IQ can effectively try to locate him and shoot through surfaces.

Doc can be prevented from reviving any Defender by quickly killing them after they are downed. 

Doc can be prevented from reviving himself by killing him as soon as he is downed.

Rook Satchel can be destroyed by Attackers. 

Attackers can also wear Rook Armor Plates if found. 

Wearing Rook armor will down the Defender instead of being killed for first time. This can be prevented by shooting them again after being downed. 

Twitch Shock drone can be used to kill Defenders who are downed. 

Capitao can use his asphyxiating bolts to kill downed Defenders. 

Any Attacker who can do any Damage with gadget can kill downed Defenders. Even throwing a flashbang can kill a downed Defender.

Kapkan traps can be destroyed by Thatcher EMP. 

Twitch can destroy the Kapkan traps. 

Any Attacker gadget when detonates, if the Kapkan trap is in the radius of the explosion will be destroyed. 

Kapkan traps can be destoyed by normal gunfire. 

Drones can be effectively used to follow Kapkan and find where he places his traps. 

IQ can detect the Kapkan traps and destroy it via walls and floors.

Montagne can deal bullets from LMG. 

Frag grenades are very effective to kill the Defender who is using the Tachanka LMG.
