Ash and Zofia are capable of shooting LMG with their grenades to destroy the front shield making the Defender who uses it vulnerable. 

Capitao asphyxiating bolts are very effective to kill Defender who is using the mounted LMG.

Stun Grenade and Ying Candela can be used to burn out the ADS to further use Frag grenades to throw at Defenders. Thatcher can destroy the ADS if in radius of the EMP. 

Twitch can destoy the ADS by using her drone . 

Jager ADS can be destroyed by normal gunfire. 

IQ can detect the Jager ADS and destroy it.

Bandit Shock wires can be destroyed by normal gunfire. 

Thatcher EMP will destroy the Shock wire if in radius. 

Twitch can use her drone to destroy Bandit Shock wire. 

Bandit when tricking for Thermite is very vulnerable from behind. 

IQ can detect the Bandit shock wire and destroy it. 

Bandit Shock wire can be destroyed by Attacker explosion gadgets if it comes in contact with them.

Any explosion device when in contact with the Gas canister in Black Mirrors will open it. 

Twitch drones can destroy Black Mirrors leaving a hole in middle of the wall Nothing can be done to remove the hole in wall. 

Buck, Sledge or Ash can be used to open Mira Black Mirrors from below and above the floor, Be careful in their placements. 

Non-reinforced walls cannot be reinforced if a Black Mirror was placed in wall. 

Mira can place Black Mirror at elevated height if she can reach it. 

Mira Black Mirror can be opened by Defenders by melee, bullet , nitro, impacting the gas canister in it. 

Ying will flash people in Mira Black Mirror even when it is not open. 

If Black Mirror is placed on unreinforced wall, destruction on the wall will destroy the Black Mirror too. 

Thermite and Hibana can destroy Mira Black Mirrors Be on the lookout for them. 

Double Mira Black Mirrors with one open and one closed is a common strategy to intimidate Attackers with prefire.

Thatcher EMP grenades will destroy Black Eyes. 

Twitch can destroy Black Eyes with her darts.

IQ is a direct counter to Valkyrie, She can detect any cameras thrown outside and prevent the advantage it has for Defenders. 

Dokkaebi can hack into Defender camera network including Black Eyes when she hacks a dead Defender phone. 

Any explosion device when in contact with the Black Eye camera will destroy it.

Interrogation will take 3 seconds and Caveira is vulnerable in that time. 

Dokkaebi can call and locate Caveira. Have a rotation route planned if you are pinned down by Attackers. 

Always drone to find out the position of Caveira. She can be very lethal for Attackers. 

Caveira is the ultimate roamer, cover you flanks and always be ready to confront her.

Yokai drone when combined with Ela can produce a series of disorientation to Attackers in group. This will render them vulnerable. 

Ela and Yokai drone effect on same Attacker will only produce latest effect on the Attacker canceling the previous one. 

Echo can be very helpful in collecting intel and assisting Roamers in Attacker movements.

Frost Welcome Mats can destroyed by a melee hit but must be done carefully or it may down you. Hit the part that does not activate the trap. 

Frost Mats can be destroyed by Ash CREM, Zofia Impact grenades, Frag grenades. 

Frost Mats can be destroyed by shooting at them. 

Frost traps will get destroyed if in radius of a explosion from Attacker gadget.

Gu Mines can be destroyed by Thatcher EMP when in range. 

Gu mines can be destroyed by Gunfire and any explosion near to it, like Frag grenades, Ash CREM, Zofia Impact grenades and more. 

IQ can detect Gu Mines though her Scanner and destroy them.

IQ can detect Ela Grizmot Mines and destroy them through surfaces. 

Twitch can destroy Grizmot Mines by shooting the dart at it. 

Thatcher can destroy any Grizmot Mines in radius of his EMP. 

Any number of Attackers caught in the Grizmot Mines detonation proximity will be disoriented. 

Grizmot Mines can be destroyed by Gunfire and any explosion near to it, like Frag grenades, Ash CREM, Zofia Impact grenades and more. 

Zofia is less affected by Ela Grizmot mines. The Grizmot mine effect only last for half the time it lasts for other Defenders. 

Montagne can be used to clear out the Ela mines from under the cover of his Extended Shield.

Jackal is very effective in tracking Vigil and find him. 

Dokkaebi can call Vigil and find his location based on the sound from his phone. 

Even when Vigil in cloak, he can be heard in drones and cameras if hacked by Dokkaebi. 

IQ can detect Vigil when the ERC7 is active. 

Thatcher can temporarily disable the ERC7 of Vigil. 

Twitch can temporarily disable the ERC7 when she shoots the dart into Vigil ERC7 gadget. 

Fuze is effective in pushing Vigil out of a room by using his Cluster charges in that room.
